category.description: The categorization for the system event, example: 'BackendProcess', 'CleanupProcedure' etc.

type.description: The type of system event to be added, example: 'CUSTOMER' for customer initiated events, 'ImportProgram' for import processes etc.

referenceId.description: Reference to other systems of processes.

severity.description: Indicates the severity of the system event as information, one of 'INFO', 'WARNING', 'ERROR'.

userId.description: The type and id of the user that triggered the system event, format: '<userType>-<userId>', e.g. '1006-123'.
